title: Ummm... whats going on O_O bug?
body:
Does anyone know what this is about? also the wolves stayed even after he get the sated devourer buff.
is this a known bug? is it purely aesthetic or do the bonuses stack too? please say no

replies.body: YEA Riot you need to fix this bug plz ive seen it so many times mainly on {{champion:83}}  junglers i mean it looks werid and after he got his 30 stacks on it .it didnt go sated he kinda raged a little so i think aside thenest patch you should try to fix this bug it looks weird and can make building the item a little bit of a waste of gold i mean you can almost buy a ludens echo fr 1000 gold more
